titleStmt.title: Sarvaṅkaṣā vyākhyā of Mallinātha on the Śiśupālavadha of Māgha (sargas- 11-14) and Commentaries on Dayāśataka, Raṅgastuti, and Hayagrīvastotra of Vedāntadeśika

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary:
This mansucript has four texts. 1. Sarvaṅkaṣā vyākhyā of Mallinātha on the Śiśupālavadha of Māgha (sargas- 11-14) and then Commentaries on Dayāśataka, Raṅgastuti, and Hayagrīvastotra of Vedāntadeśika.
Sarvaṅkaṣā vyākhyā of Mallinātha on the Śiśupālavadha of Māgha is not complete. It stopts in the middle of the commentary on the last verse of the 14th Sarga of the Śiśupālavadha. The rest of the texts are complete.
On
in the left margin is written itītitthaṁ giraḥ prīyatamā iva which is a line from the vyākhyā of verse of Śiśupālavadha (5th Sarga
erse.)
śrīramajaryyaḥ is written on the recto of the first blank folio in Grantha.

msItem.title: Sarvaṅkaṣā vyākhyā of Mallinātha on the Śiśupālavadha of Māgha (sargas- 11-14)
msItem.author: Mallinātha
msItem.incipit:
[I-
atha prastutāṁ prabhātavarṇanamārabhate śrutīti nāsti kakuryasyetyakākuravikṛtadhvaniḥ kāku striyāṁ vikāro yaśśokabhityābhirdhvanerityamaraḥ śrāvayatīti śrāvako [I-
dūradhvaniḥ snigdho madhuraśca kaṇṭhasvaro yaṣānte akākuśrāvakaśnigdhakaṇṭhāḥ
msItem.explicit:
[I-
tvādvākyārthahetukaṁ kāvyaliṅgamalaṁkāraḥ vāsanikāvṛttaṁ … 87 bhīṣmeti yeneṣṭaṁ rājasūyenamaṇḍalasyeśvaraśca yaḥ śāsti yaścājñayā rā [I-
jñassa samrāḍityamaraḥ samrājo bhāvassāmrājyaṁ tadevaśrīstāmadhigacchatā

msItem.title: Dayāśatakavyākhyā
msItem.incipit:
[II-
śrīmadevaṁkaṭanāthāryyapadaṁ vandyamupāsmahe . tat vedāntamīmāṁsāniṣṇātaṁ yasya mānasaṁ . vādhūlaśrīnivāsāryapadāñja [II-
rajase namaḥ ..
msItem.explicit:
[II-
doṣodbhāvanāśravaṇārthaṁ dayayaiva kāritamevañca doṣodbhāvanaśravaṇaṁ vidhānakṣamiti aiva kathaṁ doṣodbhāvavanaṁ kṣā [II-
ryyaṁtīti tānpaśyamīti (saṁyamana vadyaṁ ?) kavitārkkikasīmhāyyakṛpayā kṛtinā kṛtā vādhūlaśrīnivāsena dayāśatakaṭīkikā kathaṁ mayāvaseyā (lacuna 2 akzaras)
msItem.finalRubric:
[II-
kavitārkikasīnhavāk tadā vimuhya saṁkalpalubdhagrāhyatviyaṁ budhaiḥ iti vādhūlaśrīnivāsasya kṛtiḥ kṛpāśatakaṭīkikā saṁpurṇā

msItem.title: Raṁgastutivyākhyā
msItem.incipit: [III-1 1] śrīmadvādhūladāśarathaye namaḥ paśyan godāvarimagre prāṅgamukhaḥ padmakāsanaḥ narasiṁhavapurviṣṇurasya dharmapure vasat veṁkaṭācārya [III-1 2] varyasya caraṇau śaraṇaṁ vṛṇe
msItem.explicit:
[III-
samīpe iti atra pūrvamayodhyāyāssarayutīre śrīraṁganāthasya rāmacandrasītāmabhipretyoktamiti mantavyaṁ kāverītīre tadarccanā saṁbhavāditi 124

msItem.title: Hayagrīvastotravyākhyā
msItem.rubric: [IV- 1] 1 śrīmānveṁkaṭanāthāryyaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntacāryyavaryyo me sannidhattāṁ sadā hṛdi ||
msItem.incipit: [IV-1 1] jñānānandamayandevaṁ nirmalasphaṭīkākṛtiṁ ādhāraṁ sarvavidyānāṁ [IV-1 2] hayagrīvamupāsmahe || indirāmandirora?midrādisuravanditaṁ vandāribṛndamandāraṁ vande govindabālakaṁ
msItem.finalRubric:
[IV-
kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṁkaṭeśāya [IV-
vedāntagurave namaḥ hayagrīvastotravyākhyāsaṁpūrṇā

support.p: Wooden thick guard folio. Kaya is written in Devanagari script in pencil in the left side of the guard folio. Some scratches on the right side of the guard folio.

extent.measure: 1 guard folios, 3 blank folios, 142 written folios and also folio 27 is blank.

supportDesc.foliation:
Tamil numbering. Every texts begins with the separate numbering but for the third text the last folio is numbered as 130, this shows the continuation of numbering from the first text of the manuscript. Folio 27 is blank and
has only one line written and the rest of the folio is blank.
supportDesc.condition: The folio has worm holes and broken edges.

handNote.desc: Readable. Some letters are so mixed with other following that it is difficult to read.

additions.desc:
Titles of the texts are mentioned on the first folio of the text and shortforms are mentioned irregularly in the left margin of the following folios. da is written on some folio in the left margin of the verso. raṁ is written in the left margin from II-
-
. ha is written in the left margin from VI-
--
.
hariḥ oṁ is written in the left margin of with the title of the every text in this manuscript.
Number 19 is written on the front and back side of the guard folio in pink pencil.

origin.origDate: The colophon at the end of the text 3 Raṁgastutivyākhyā the manuscript is written between 1922-23 in the month of āṣāḍha or according to tamil calendar āni which is according to Gregorian Calendar is mid June to mid July.

listBibl.bibl: Shishupal Vadh Of Magh With Commentary Of Mallinath, edi. Durga Prasad, 1923 : Nirnay Sagar Press.

encodingDesc.p: As the folio numbering begins with 1 for each text to avoid conflict text numbers are added with the folio numbers. From the second text onwards the first folio is not numbered. Numbering begins with 2 so have supplied folio number 1.

TEI.text:
[I-
atha prastutāṁ prabhātavarṇanamārabhate śrutīti nāsti kakuryasyetyakākuravikṛtadhvaniḥ kāku striyāṁ vikāro yaśśokabhityābhirdhvanerityamaraḥ śrāvayatīti śrāvako [I-
dūradhvaniḥ snigdho madhuraśca kaṇṭhasvaro yaṣānte akākuśrāvakaśnigdhakaṇṭhāḥ
[I-
tvādvākyārthahetukaṁ kāvyaliṅgamalaṁkāraḥ vāsanikāvṛttaṁ … 87 bhīṣmeti yeneṣṭaṁ rājasūyenamaṇḍalasyeśvaraśca yaḥ śāsti yaścājñayā rā [I-
jñassa samrāḍityamaraḥ samrājo bhāvassāmrājyaṁ tadevaśrīstāmadhigacchatā

[II-
śrīmadvādhūladāśarathaye namaḥ || śrīmadevaṁkaṭanāthāryyapadaṁ vandyamupāsmahe | tat vedāntamīmāṁsāniṣṇātaṁ yasya mānasaṁ | vādhūlaśrīnivāsāryapadāñja [II-
rajase namaḥ ||
[II-
doṣodbhāvanāśravaṇārthaṁ dayayaiva kāritamevañca doṣodbhāvanaśravaṇaṁ vidhānakṣamiti aiva kathaṁ doṣodbhāvavanaṁ kṣā [II-
ryyaṁtīti tānpaśyamīti (saṁyamana vadyaṁ ) kavitārkkikasīmhāyyakṛpayā kṛtinā kṛtā vādhūlaśrīnivāsena dayāśatakaṭīkikā kathaṁ mayāvaseyā [II-
kavitārkikasīnhavāk tadā vimuhya saṁkalpalubdhagrāhyatviyaṁ budhaiḥ iti vādhūlaśrīnivāsasya kṛtiḥ kṛpāśatakaṭīkikā saṁpurṇā śrīmān hariḥ hariḥ oṁ śubhamastu ||

[III-1 1] śrimate hayagrīvāya namaḥ śrīmadvādhūladāśarathaye namaḥ paśyan godāvarimagre prāṅgamukhaḥ padmakāsanaḥ narasiṁhavapurviṣṇurasya dharmapure vasat veṁkaṭācārya [III-1 2] varyasya caraṇau śaraṇaṁ vṛṇe
[III-
samīpe iti atra pūrvamayodhyāyāssarayutīre śrīraṁganāthasya rāmacandrasītāmabhipretyoktamiti mantavyaṁ kāverītīre tadarccanā saṁbhavāditi 124 [III-
śrīraṁgarājastavassamākhyānassamāptimagamat || śrīmad vādhūladāśarathaye namaḥ śrimatsamarapuṁgavasadgurave namaḥ dundubhināmasaṁvatsaraṁ mithunamāsaḥ || |

[IV- 1] 1 śrīmānveṁkaṭanāthāryyaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntacāryyavaryyo me sannidhattāṁ sadā hṛdi || jñānānandamayandevaṁ nirmalasphaṭīkākṛtiṁ ādhāraṁ sarvavidyānāṁ [IV-1 2] hayagrīvamupāsmahe || indirāmandirora?midrādisuravanditaṁ vandāribṛndamandāraṁ vande govindabālakaṁ
[IV-
bhaktyā paṭhan anusandardhyaṁ ruya kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṁkaṭeśāya [IV-
vedāntagurave namaḥ hayagrīvastotravyākhyāsaṁpūrṇā śrīmatehayagrīvāya namaḥ hariḥ oṁ |
